origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'GovernmentAPI.get_subsidy', 'description': 'This function provides information on government subsidies available for specific industries in certain regions.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'industry', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The industry seeking subsidies, e.g., EVCharging, RenewableEnergy.'}, {'name': 'region', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The geographical region where the industry operates, e.g., California, NewYork.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'subsidyDetails', 'description': 'Details of the available subsidies including eligibility and amount.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 GovernmentAPI.get_subsidy, 它的参数输入如下: 'industry'是'EVCharging', 'region'是'California'.
